About Geek Mane



Geek literally means someone who is not so fashionable, gregarious and also being socially inept means to say one who doesn't bother how he looks or speaks, completely unconscious about modern trends or culture they are very awkward by personality and attitude.

However, in Geek Maniacs we think different: You can always be hardcore enthusiastic and knowledgeble about something and still have so much personality

Now you have on the Internet the online store where you will find the best selection of items with gaming and anime stuff from all over the internet: shirts, rings, pendants, pants, boots, jackets, costumes and any other fashion item, accessories, art or decoration.

Our passion goes far beyond the store, we are a movement in defense of the beauty and ideals of this symbol, in our blog you will find articles that explore the confines, history and any topic related to the world of anime, gaming and technology.

Welcome to Geek Maniacs!
